meanings.definition: A vegetable with long green stalks and leaves used in cooking and salads.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy eating crunchy celery with peanut butter as a snack.
meanings.sent2: My mom adds celery to her chicken noodle soup for extra flavor.
meanings.sent3: Why did the celery refuse to play hide and seek? Because it was always stalk-ing!
meanings.sent4: The celery stood tall in the garden, a green tower reaching for the sky.
meanings.sent5: The fresh scent of celery filled the kitchen as the chef chopped it for the salad.

meanings.definition: The crisp, pale green stalks of this plant eaten as a vegetable.
meanings.sent1: She packed some celery sticks in her lunchbox for a healthy snack.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store had a sale on celery, so I bought a bunch.
meanings.sent3: Why did the celery go to the doctor? It was feeling a bit stalky!
meanings.sent4: The celery in the garden glistened with dew, like nature's own jewels.
meanings.sent5: The crunch of fresh celery echoed in the quiet room as she took a bite.
